spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate. Rooms are in correct adjacency. Minor scaling compression noted in the Pantry/Kitchen junction and slightly shallow Master Suite proportions. Door swings are mostly correct, though Bed 3 door is slightly misaligned with the wall thickness.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural translation. All rooms accounted for. Floor-plan lines are cleaned up. Background is dark and neutral. A small deduction for the Portico area which feels slightly interpretation-heavy compared to the flat 2D lines.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping. The L-shaped sofa in the Theatre and the island bench in the Kitchen are perfectly replicated. The Garage vehicle and Alfresco dining set correspond well to the plan annotations.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style. Flat shading and soft ambient occlusion are present. True orthographic isometric camera used. Slight penalty for the car asset being slightly higher-poly/detailed compared to the rest of the blocky environment.

detected_errors.description: Minor wall alignment and hallway width distortion near the central 'Activity' and 'Linen' closet transition.
The vehicle in the garage uses a slightly more detailed model than the rest of the low-poly block aesthetic.
